2095920.name: PITCHvr™ Vision - High School Expanded
2095920.description:
The PITCHvr™ Vision - High School Expanded DLC is an extensive data base of pitches from various arm angles (overhand, sidearm and submarine) for training High School level baseball players in conjunction with the main PITCHvr™ Vision software that includes Fastballs, Curveballs, Sliders, and Change ups. (The data base that is included with PITCHvr™ Vision contains only High School level pitches thrown at 3/4 arm.)

Please note that while PITCHvr™ Vision - High School Expanded adapts to the players skill level during sessions., The best High School hitters in the world will be challenged, so leave your ego on the bench.

This pitch data set includes hundreds of Overhand, Sidearm, and Submarine release pitches with the following types and speed ranges in MPH (miles per hour):

> Change up....................................................CH...............70-74 MPH
> Slurve.............................................................CU1.............70-74
> Hybrid between Slurve and 12-6.........CU2.............68-72
> 12 to 6 curve...............................................CU3.............66-70
> Cutter.............................................................FC................76-85
> Four seam fastball.....................................FF.................76-85
> Split finger fastball....................................FS.................76-85
> Two seam fastball.....................................FT..................76-85
> Slider with more run and less depth..SL1................74-78
> Slider with less run and more depth..SL2................76-80
2095920.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
